channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: George Conway Burns 'Loon' Trump With A Scathing New Nickname After Parade Flop
Israel-Iran Conflict Continues, No Sign of Easing

Israel furious as France shuts four weapons stands at Paris Airshow
We won't see mortgage rate 'relief' this year, strategist says
Vance Boelter taken into custody for lawmaker shootings
item.description: The man authorities believe shot two Minnesota lawmakers and their spouses in politically motivated shootings early Saturday morning is now in custody...

item.title: WATCH: Flash floods destroy homes and wash away roads in West Virginia
item.description: There is a state of emergency in West Virgina where at least three people are dead and several missing from flash flooding Saturday night.

item.title: The AI revolution is likely to drive up your electricity bill. Here's why.
item.description: Utilities are racing to build data centers to meet surging demand for AI and other tech services. Ratepayers will pick up the tab, experts say.

item.title: Minnesota lawmakers shooting suspect Vance Boelter due in court Monday
item.description: Vance Boelter, the man suspected of a fatal shooting that targeted lawmakers in Minnesota, is expected to appear on Monday in a Minneapolis court.

item.title: The lawmaker shootings in Minnesota are a disturbing trend: Analysis
item.description: The recent shootings of lawmakers in Minnesota are part of a disturbing trend toward politically linked violence, ABC News analysts say.

item.title: A revolutionary drug for extreme hunger offers clues to obesity's complexity

item.title: WATCH: Hammerhead shark falls from sky onto South Carolina disc golf course
item.description: A group of disc golfers witnessed a baby hammerhead shark fall from the sky while in the middle of a game on the morning of May 18 in Myrtle Beach, So...

item.title: WATCH: Trump announced presidential run 10 years ago today
item.description: In 2015, Donald Trump was the 12th Republican to announce his candidacy after descending a golden escalator at Trump Tower in New York.

item.title: Israel accuses Iran of targeting civilians, killing 8 in missile strikes
item.description: Israel says Iran is targeting civilians, killing 8 people, as the Israeli military hammers Iranian launch sites and says it controls Tehran's skies.

item.title: Friends say Minnesota shooting suspect was deeply religious and conservative
